title: Bucks on the Brink, Giannis vs. History, Finals Leaps, and NFL Bets With Joe House
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Joe House to discuss the Bucks’ Game 5 Finals win over the Suns, Giannis Antetokounmpo's enthralling basketball journey, what the Suns need in order to pull off a Game 6 win, and more (3:15). They then talk a little golf, NFL futures bets, Olympic basketball, and more (1:02:40).

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Joe House 
Producer: Kyle Crichton 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
